name: MikeCraft
description: This game is an ASCII-Art RPG parody of the game with a similar name, made entirely within the windows console. In this game you are a character named Mike, and you must collect various materials from around the game world to survive! To help get you started on your journey, I decided to make a guide and list of controls that can be found in the download (README.txt). This was originally a midterm for college but I decided to take it a little further and see how far I could go. Please enjoy and let me know what you think! :D
